title: Razorblade Typhoon
summaries: The Razorblade Typhoon is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires a large, fast, disc-shaped projectile upon use that homes in on enemies. It can pierce and ricochet any number of times, lasting (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 2.5 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 3 seconds. The Razorblade Typhoon has a 20*1/5 (20%) chance of being dropped by Duke Fishron.

statistics.Damage:
85 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) /
60 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
statistics.Mana: 20 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 18 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
